name: Snotty's Sewer
description:
In this indie horror, you meet Mr Snotty! Originally a beloved children's TV character, Mr Snotty turned violent after being chased out of the local TV station along with all of his friends into an abandoned sewer. Unfortunately for you, you are now trapped there too! Search for the 10 hidden buttons throughout the sewer that unlock the door to escape the nightmare!



With Mr Snotty and his friends roaming the abandoned sewer, you need to search every corner of the sewer for the hidden buttons. However, if they see you or hear you they will hunt you down and turn you into one of their new friends!



Littered around the sewer are items that have travelled down the pipes from above. Use them to light your way, recharge a flashlight or even unlock hidden shortcuts in the sewer.

Press the buttons, collect the items and unlock the escape. Just don't get caught by Mr Snotty or his friends...
